title: East Germany national under-16 football team
text:
The East Germany junior football team was the under-16 (continental competitions) and under-17 (world competitions) <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> team of <a href="East%20Germany">East Germany</a>. 
After <a href="German%20reunification">German reunification</a> in 1990, the Deutscher Fußball Verband der DDR (DFV), and with it the East German team, joined the "<a href="Deutscher%20Fu%C3%9Fball%20Bund">Deutscher Fußball Bund</a>" (DFB).
